headline.print_headline: To Lower Risk on Jogging Trail, Get Off the Couch
headline.main: To Lower Risk on Jogging Trail, Get Off the Couch

docs.lead_paragraph: Over all, people who jog are less likely to have a heart attack in the long run than if they had not been joggers.
docs.snippet: Over all, people who jog are less likely to have a heart attack in the long run than if they had not been joggers.

docs.abstract: In some deals, the synergies are a bit too obvious. In this category might go Nestle's decision to pay about $600 million for Jenny Craig, a purchase that would put the maker of KitKat candy bars and a well-known weight-loss company under the same corporate ownership. headline.print_headline: Nestlé to Buy Jenny Craig, Betting Diets Are on Rise
headline.main: Nestlé to Buy Jenny Craig, Betting Diets Are on Rise

docs.lead_paragraph: Nestlé, the Swiss food giant, is planning to announce today that it has agreed to pay about $600 million for Jenny Craig.
docs.snippet: Nestlé, the Swiss food giant, is planning to announce today that it has agreed to pay about $600 million for Jenny Craig.

headline.print_headline: Laws Can Be Good for You, Mayor Tells Health Officials
headline.main: Laws Can Be Good for You, Mayor Tells Health Officials

docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, June 14 — Putting New York's aggressive public health agenda on a national stage, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg told some of the nation's top health officials on Wednesday that government should use laws to influence behavior to fight chronic disease.
